item.title: Action button
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

sendQuest(“Buy”, 13770);
sendQuest(“Sell”, 13771);
sendQuest(“None”, 13772);
sendFrame164(13768);
}

Ok this is the thing I got from delta’s dialog TUT, how do I make another one, because when I try to use these then it does what these do for the trade status,

So if I wanted to make another like this

sendQuest(“Buy”, 2334);
sendQuest(“Sell”, 2445);
sendQuest(“None”, 2335);
sendFrame164(13768);

What would the action buttons be? If you have a link to the action buttons, or SENDFRAMES, (what I have been asking delta about, for4 freaking hours! Then please post…
